entries.name: LibriVox
entries.description: Public domain audiobooks read by volunteers.

entries.name: The Magic Catalog
entries.description: Ebook catalog linking to all of Project Gutenberg’s titles

entries.name: OverDrive/Libby
entries.description: Ebooks, audiobooks, and other materials available through your public library.

entries.name: Hoopla
entries.description: Ebooks, audiobooks, and other materials available through your public library.

entries.name: American FactFinder
entries.description: Searchable data from the U.S. census

entries.name: Last10K.com
entries.description: SEC filings, including annual and quarterly reports

entries.name: BEA
entries.description: Economic data from the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis

entries.name: OECD Data
entries.description: International economic data from the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development

entries.name: Sexualitics
entries.description: Performance data from a large portion of uploads to porn sites xHamster and Xnxx

entries.name: Vertex42
entries.description: Spreadsheet templates for Excel and Google Sheets

entries.name: My Abandonware
entries.description: Old video games “abandoned” by the developer

entries.name: Internet Arcade
entries.description: Web-playable versions of classic video games on the Internet Archive

entries.name: Console Living Room
entries.description: Web-playable versions of classic video games on the Internet Archive

entries.name: Game-Owl
entries.description: Downloadable video games (caution: one redditor warns of possible malware)

entries.name: Resource Cards
entries.description: Catalog of free resources including stock photos, icons, and tools for Photoshop, Boostrap, WordPress, web development, and SEO

entries.name: Librestock
entries.description: Metasearch that combines several of the above image libraries

entries.name: Awesome Images
entries.description: A list of over 30 more image libraries

entries.name: Placeholder.com
entries.description: Simple placeholder images marked with their width and height, at any measurement

entries.name: blender.org
entries.description: Open source 3d modeling, animation, compositing and motion tracking

entries.name: RStudio
entries.description: Applications for the open source statistical coding R

entries.name: OpenGameArt.org
entries.description: Video game art assets of varying styles

entries.name: BBC Sound Effects
entries.description: Free for personal and educational use

entries.name: OverClock ReMix
entries.description: Originals and covers of video game music, much of it legal for reuse

entries.name: Mixing Secrets for the Small Studio
entries.description: Guide to mixing music, and sample tracks to use

entries.name: Cymatics
entries.description: Royalty free sounds and presets for music production

entries.name: UCSB Cylinder Audio Archive
entries.description: Public domain music, speeches, and other audio recorded from wax cylinders

entries.name: Ninite
entries.description: Select from a list of free essential apps (like Skype, Evernote, GIMP, Malwarebytes, and Chrome) to install and update at the same time

entries.name: LibreOffice
entries.description: Open source alternative to MS Word

entries.name: OpenOffice
entries.description: Open source alternative to MS Word

entries.name: Archive.org
entries.description: A motherlode of collections of music, videos, images, games, and written materials from non-profits, schools, government organizations, and the public domain. See top collections on the front page. Also home to the Wayback Machine.

entries.name: NYPL Digital Collections
entries.description: Digitized ephemera from the New York Public Library

entries.name: Library of Congress Digital Collections
entries.description: Digitized ephemera from the Library of Congress

entries.name: Library of Babel
entries.description: Technically contains every book up to a certain length—because it contains every combination of characters, almost all of them gibberish, only generated the moment you load the page

entries.name: Textfiles
entries.description: Collection of old online text files, under categories like Conspiracy, Ham Radio, and Science Fiction.

entries.name: #ColorOurCollections
entries.description: Black and white drawings from museums and libraries, suggested as printable coloring books

entries.name: Hubble Space Telescope
entries.description: Images of space from NASA’s orbiting telescope

entries.name: No Excuse List
entries.description: Catalog of free online courses, how-to guides, and and educational sites

entries.name: CommonLit
entries.description: Reading passages, lessons, and other literary education tools for teachers

entries.name: Lego Building Instructions
entries.description: Building instructions for every Lego set

entries.name: Thingiverse
entries.description: 3D models that you can print on your own 3D printer (or a rental or library model)
